title: Establishes protection for senior citizens against unwarranted eviction
summary: Establishes protection for senior citizens against unwarranted eviction; requires plaintiff/landlord to file an affidavit determining whether or not the respondent is a senior citizen and sets forth guidelines and procedures for a default eviction against a senior citizen, including representation of counsel; defines senior citizen as persons aged 62 or over for purposes of real property actions and proceedings law.
lawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to establishing protection for senior citizens against unwarranted eviction
